line_1: The wheels o' life gae down-hill, scrievin,
line_2: Food fills the wame, an' keeps us livin;

line_1: The wheels o' life gae down-hill, scrievin,
line_2: Tho' life's a gift no worth receivin,

line_1: The wheels o' life gae down-hill, scrievin,
line_2: When heavy-dragg'd wi' pine an' grievin;

line_1: An' owre the hill gaed scrievin,
line_2: To dip her left sark-sleeve in,
